description: This restaurant has just a few tables amid a decor of elegantly recycled old wood, while a large window offers views of the stunning Ampezzo Dolomites outside. Your meal starts in a memorable way:...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Great view, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
